Text:
Just FYI - I did not intend on giving this the title of Veronica No 202 but rather, Archie Comics Meet Kevin Keller but once you upload to TPB you cannot go back and edit your upload so you're stuck with what you originally upload in the way of description.  Geez, I wish they would fix that! 

Kevin gets his own comic and there are currently three issued, the forth is the wedding issue to be released in mid-December.  Kevin appears in two of Veronica's issues, Number 202 "Meet Kevin Keller" and "Kevin Returns" Number 205.  I have them all and will upload them as time permits.  Look for them!  Enjoy!
